text: oh nice if I
hello hello this episode is sponsored by
Philo which as you can see here is a TV
app in fact it's one that I've been
using for the last year whether it be at
home on my Smart TV or on the go during
travel for just 20 bucks a month I get
access to over 50 live channels which
means no more waiting around while other
people gossip about 90-day fiance or
catfish if I do miss anything I just hit
record so I can binge watch later Philo
of course has lots of family-friendly
stuff as well in fact I use it for
spongebob all the time regardless of my
age if you click the link in the
description box down below you can join
me and try Philo absolutely free for
seven days plus get a 30% discount for
your first month on top of that huge
thank you to Philo for sponsoring this
video and independent creators alike and
what all that said let's begin in 2019
we are definitely spoiled for choice
when it comes to entertainment one such
form of entertainment comes to us via
escape rooms real-life mystery games
involving puzzles and clues that will
lead to your eventual freedom to me they
come off like the closest thing to real
life Arg s as we can get if you live in
the u.s. chances are you've at least
passed by one of these types of
establishments at some point but the
appeal of the escape room isn't limited
to just America in fact today's story
begins with an escape room all the way
in the Philippines one by the name of
breakout the business has a healthy of
345 thousand likes on Facebook at the
time of writing this and a very solid
reputation amongst its fans recently
however there has been something going
on drawing more attention than usual to
this escape room on June 7th of 2019
breakout posts of the following
according to the business a solo player
had just set a new record an impressive
six minutes and 30 seconds to beat their
hide and seek room breakout also
emphasized that the new record holder
was a newbie which made the feat even
more impressive presumably for the sake
of privacy the exact name of the player
wasn't mentioned but the post did refer
to the person by their initials MJ M a
photo also accompanied the post but the
players face had been obscured the post
initially seemed pretty harmless
collecting the usual likes and shares
nobody really suspected anything out of
the ordinary but of course if that was
the end of the story then we wouldn't be
here today a user by the name of Mary
Jane Mendoza left a comment on the post
one that talks about weird dreams that
she'd been having about the Roman how it
had been her first time playing the
responses were mostly of people asking
Mary if she was in fact the new record
holder mjm but before she could reply we
actually get a response from the
business that confirms us our
supervisors were very amused / alarm /
scared when you were telling them you
dreamt about this room it's kind of hard
to believe but after cross-checking
multiple times you definitely not have
played in any of our rooms kudos to you
marry eventually responds with the
following this is all really a bit
overwhelming I really just wanted to try
the room to make sense of what I've been
going through I hoped it would help
explain some of the dreams I've been
having but now I just have more
questions another user chimes in
explaining to Mary that it's just a game
he also later adds that he checked to
Mary's page and noticed something
strange Mary actually had sketches from
the dream she described sketches of a
room and according to the user these
sketches matched the hide-and-seek worm
perfectly this of course should be no
surprise because after all we're on a
thread about how Mary beat the room in
record time the only problem here though
is Mary's next response she explains but
those sketches are from before I even
tried the room I know they look a little
like the room I tried but there's no way
it could be it's creeping me out too if
you continue on throughout the thread
there's still quite a bit of back and
forth between Mary breakout and other
users but before we push forward we're
going to need to take a step back and
try to make sense of what's going on
with Mary if you head to Mary's page
you'll see that her visible post date
back to May 22nd a few weeks before she
was announced as breakouts a new record
holder Mary's timeline begins with a
post reading Here I am waiting for the
sunrise presumably implying that she's
been up all night and that dawn
finally approaching all in the same day
we get picture post related to
enlightenment and another text post this
time reading I've been having strange
dreams I wonder what they mean
on the next day may 23rd Mary posts
quite a few times once again we see a
photo this time of a landscape on a
cloudy day the caption reading
overthinking is the biggest cause of
unhappiness and of course Mary also
posts about how she's lost in thought on
this day we also get a few links to
external sites the first being a reddit
post Mary stumbled upon the post in
question was made on our / dreams and
describes a reoccurring dream about a
specific place one described as having a
lot of grass and a gray sky the caption
for this link is pretty interesting glad
to know I'm not the only one Mary writes
perhaps someone can help me identify
this place I've been seeing a lot in my
dreams but then again they're just
dreams surely no one will bother the
other two links for this day are from
the same site a blogspot page about
enlightenment the first post explains
how the path to enlightenment can only
be found if you know your purpose in
life and that wandering aimlessly will
never accomplish anything the second
post is a link to yet another site this
time featuring an article describing
eleven stages to reach enlightenment out
of all of this Mary picks out a single
quote accept what you have except the
things that you cannot change there is
one last post for this day but as you
can see it's unfortunately unavailable
so at this point based on what we've
seen it's safe to assume that Mary is
already feeling overwhelmed like she
needs to seek some form of guidance to
help calm her down whether it be via
meditation or whatever else she's able
to find online day 3 May 24th greets us
with a picture of a drawing that made by
Mary my dreams have been taking me to
different places lately she writes is
this an attic a caravan I'm curious to
know what's behind that tiny door for
the next couple days we get more posts
about enlightenment and the usual
Facebook inspirational quote type stuff
we also see another post from the
blogspot to page this time in regards to
Ora something the page describes as
being like an electromagnetic field that
surrounds all of
it dives into different types of auras
be it spiritual mental physical etc meri
expresses an interest in the topic May
27 that brings us another drawing as you
can see here this time the caption reads
I just had the most vivid dream the
dream felt more real than real is that
even possible in my dream there was so
much to see and so much to do but this
painting in particular caught my
attention I wonder if it means anything
one user decided to ask some very good
questions about this image they asked if
the bird is supposed to be a crow or
Raven or if our attention should
actually be centred on the moon maybe
even the flowers unfortunately there was
no answer later that day Mary posts it
again this time lamenting over how
different she feels how disconnected she
is from the world the post after that is
where things start to pick up a little
bit but also where things are going to
get a touch messy we once again get a
post from the blogspot page this time
Mary mentions feeling creeped out about
a countdown timer this link has been
shared to me by a follower apparently he
found this on a website about
enlightenment and astral projection it's
counting down to something to what I
don't know but knowing it's about
enlightenment makes me think that this
will be something good now of course
since this was a little while ago the
countdown has expired and for the sake
of continuity we'll get to what it says
a little bit later via Mary's reactions
May 28th 506 a.m. we get our first post
of the day from Mary this time vaguely
stating that she had yet another strange
dream her next post is much more
detailed this time involving the sketch
you see here sometimes I just see myself
standing before this I don't know drawer
I guess and every time I can't help but
lovingly run my hands among these
stuffed animals all of them smiling at
me but I know I recognize the melancholy
in their eyes and one of them tells me
to open it I look around and see the
locks on the drawers and I know there
are secrets inside them waiting to be
discovered I try and try plugging in
these combination and it just won't work
what am I missing throughout the rest of
the day Mary continues to post but only
in one-liners she mentions being bored
and not being able to get the countdown
sight out of her head
may 29th marry once again up early posts
yet another sketch from a dream she had
the night prior she describes waking up
in this bed in her dreams on a
reoccurring basis and every time she'd
hear what sounded like her mother
calling her to breakfast but when she
reached for the door she always wake up
later that day Mary explains a feeling
and odd sense of deja vu even mentioning
that the countdown timer is set to go
off in 10 days which to her feels like
all too long to wait may 31st another
sketch the stream was vague to say the
least
mary explains I didn't quite get to feel
like I was entirely in that place I seem
to have been drawn to the plants in
particular strange the next day June 1st
we get yet another sketch this time of
an old school TV with miscellaneous
items on top of it Mary describes seeing
this in her dreams the TV screen briefly
depicting the image of a young child
before cutting away to static and Mary
awakening June 2nd another sketch this
time of the bedroom we saw depicted
before only this time we see two dresses
hanging on the wall Mary explains that
in the stream she was upset due to an
argument with her mother who wanted her
to wear one of these to church Mary
however preferred to wear something less
formal and more comfortable
later that day Mary once again posts
this time saying that she showed her
friends her sketches and that they
claimed it looked familiar
shortly after Mary posts about the break
out escape room the place her friends
claimed resembled the drawings she'd
been making in the early hours of June
3rd Mary makes a couple of posts talking
about how she couldn't sleep
because she was still lost and thought
about the room in her dreams she also
mentions how uneasy it makes her feel
later that day she posts a couple more
times most notably about the ongoing
countdown timer that was now down to 6
days remaining June 4th Mary describes
another dream she says that in it she
found herself once again sitting in
front of the TV in the living room in
the middle of this she begins to hear
the door knob to her room start to
rattle from the inside she describes us
as strange because only her and her
mother should have been home and her
mother presumably had no reason to be in
her daughter's bedroom Mary went over to
investigate
and surely enough there were people in
her room for some reason whispering in a
manner that she described as frantic at
this point Mary was thoroughly terrified
but before she could react the people in
the room began to shout enthusiastically
about a key a moment later the door
opened and the people inside pass right
through her like she was made of nothing
but air we get yet another post later
that afternoon this time with another
sketch and dream descriptions that read
as follows
it was so hot outside but because of my
lack of sleep last night I found my eyes
shutting down as I was watching soap
making videos on YouTube I found myself
sulking as I said on the floor while
putting away books on my shelf mom was
mad at me for making such a mess but I
didn't do it I protested and told her
about the people who came into my room
she wouldn't hear a word of it and
warned me that little girls who'll I get
their tongues cut out I had no choice
but to put the Shelf in order so I can
go back to watching TV it took me that
15 minutes to put everything back and I
was now sitting happily in front of my
favorite show my spot on the floor
hadn't even gotten the chance to warm up
yet when I heard the commotion outside
of our door three people this time burst
into our living room and started turning
everything upside down even the Shelf I
just cleaned up a girl found my doll
hidden on the lower shelf and waved it
happily in the air and all of them
proceeded to go inside the bathroom my
mom must have heard all the ruckus and
went to the living room missing all the
people by a hair she scolded me and told
me to clean up again this time violently
tugging at my arm as I refused to stand
up it felt real cuz it was real my mom
was yanking me because I fell asleep on
our patio and she made me come inside it
had only been about five minutes since I
closed my eyes my mom told me in my
dreams it felt like I was there for a
lifetime On June 5th Mary finally
declares being fed up with her
reoccurring nightmares and decides to
book a solo trip to breakouts hide and
seek room something even her online
followers had started urging her to do
at 2:55 p.m. that same day Mary posts
the following there's only a few hours
left before I try the hide and seek room
I'm a little bit scared and nervous what
if these people are telling me the truth
what do my dreams mean 553 PM heading
over for my game my heart is racing I
guess there's no turning back
I need to find those answers after this
we don't get any updates for several
hours and at 10:40 6:00 p.m. a frantic
sounding Mary posts this I didn't even
realize my mom was calling me non-stop I
just got home and she is so mad but I
can't understand any of the things she's
saying right now I feel like my head is
about to float off my body I don't
understand what just happened
I remember just wanting to get out of
there to get away from that place I
wanted to run as soon as I got out of
the room but their staff stopped me and
insisted that they had my photo taken I
wanted to scream at all of them but I
just found myself sitting there while
they hand me these placards and forms to
fill out my ears are ringing so loudly I
really couldn't hear what they were
telling me Mary continues my body felt
so numb my head so light and my stomach
so heavy I just walked out of there and
just went to where my feet would take me
at some point I think I got scolded by
traffic and forced her when I almost
walked past the curb I don't know I
found myself in this mall I'm not sure
there were lots of people I think and I
kept on bumping into some of them as I
walked and walked and walked what on
earth is going on is this some sick joke
but that night Mary was left too afraid
to go to sleep of course because of this
the frantic post continued well into the
early morning hours each one more
scattered than the last eventually her
typing begins to degrade the next day
June 6 we get a more sane sounding post
from a sleep-deprived Mary she starts
off by apologizing for last night's post
admitting that even she felt like she
had overreacted a bit she did however
have some clarifying to do and asked for
any logical scientific explanation to
what she experienced tonight for Mary
summarizes everything that had been
going on in as brief a manner as she
could manage reiterating how she'd been
having reoccurring dreams where she was
once again a little girl in a certain
setting the house and bedroom that she
didn't recognize she mentions some of my
friends have mentioned that some of the
sketches I've drawn have in minded them
of this escape room and I decided to
play only yesterday they weren't wrong
please don't judge me I'm not insane at
least the last time I checked I wasn't
I've never tried the sort of game before
and I've never really been that
interested in them so I don't really
understand why I would even dream about
them let alone this one in particular
Mary goes on tell
how once she removed her blindfold in
the escape room what she saw was
identical to the place she kept seeing
in her dreams the same TV door shelf etc
she claimed that even the smell was
familiar to her she once again insists
that she had never been to that location
before nor had she done any sort of
search for it online in fact according
to her finding pictures of the room that
predate these events proved to be
impossible the only thing she could find
was a post about the old location
supposedly being haunted June 8th 6:48
a.m. another lengthy post from Mary this
time she begins by thanking people who
deemed her in response to the last major
post one explanation she thought stuck
out the most was astral projection
something mentioned on the blogspot page
she chooses to frequent very quickly if
you've never heard of astral projection
before Wikipedia describes it as an
out-of-body experience in which your
soul / consciousness aka your astral
body separates from the physical body
enabling it to travel so basically it's
what happens when the bald lady from
Doctor Strange punches you in the gut if
I'm remembering properly I think they
even use the same terminology honestly
right now I can't even remember because
I've still got endgame burned into my
brain anyway Mary also mentions a reddit
link her followers found via a blog she
follows presumably this one the issue
here however is that I'm unable to find
the link in question it seems that it
may have been removed or I may just be
looking in the wrong places the final
paragraph here describes how hurt Mary
is feeling about the allegations being
made against her presumably about people
claiming that she's faking everything
etc keep in mind that this was posted on
June 8th only a day after her new record
at breakout had been announced June 9th
the countdown timer is now down to just
eight hours later that same day we get
this video
[Music]
the next post addresses what came up at
the end of the countdown mary claims to
have a headache but otherwise doesn't
seem to be doing all that bad she
describes this as underwhelming
chuckling at the fact that she even
worried about it at all a comment here
below tries to help her make sense of it
asking if perhaps there was a letter in
one of her dreams but all mary says in
response is that there's more going on
here June 10th this is where things
definitely start to pick up in a real
way and in my opinion this marks the
final act of the story so far things
start out well Mary describes a pleasant
dream for once one involving thousands
of red butterflies this will be relevant
later this time we also get something we
never have before a video from Mary be
warned if you decide to follow this for
yourself
the video features basically no English
so I'll try to summarize the best I can
if any pino a homies out there want to
post a full transcript that's translated
for our English only friends be my guest
anyway the video doesn't feature Mary's
face instead the camera is pointed away
from her and serves as audio only she
begins by introducing herself mentioning
the DM she'd been receiving she sounds
genuinely frustrated and overwhelmed
especially about the people attacking
her online over what's been going on she
says people were treating her situation
like some kind of joke despite how
distressing had been for her to
experience she brings up the countdown
timer explaining to us again how when it
reached zero writing had come up
according to her from the reddit page
people were able to locate an Instagram
page one by the name of when I sleep I
walk this account is actually a major
player in the story but before we dive
into what that is exactly let's wrap up
Mary's video she goes on to call the
owner of the Instagram account by the
nickname sleepwalker and she also
mentions having this gut feeling that
whoever it is they're responsible for
everything Mary also adds feeling like
people are out to get her and that
sleepwalker especially is targeting her
the mood at the end of this video is the
same as how it felt to begin with Mary
having a very clear sense of dread and
fear unfortunately things don't get
better for Mary in the next post she'd
received a DM via Instagram from the one
she calls sleepwalker admittedly this is
a cringy poem about followers and subs
I'm willing to give the story a break
point is creepy stalker is doing creepy
stalker things June 11th things begin to
escalate even more Mary wakes up frantic
again she brings up a previous dream
involving red butterflies which she's
now discovered weren't butterflies at
all for some reason she is now so shaken
that she feels the need to run away and
hide the next post-it features this
according to Mary she found this in her
bag and can't come up with a way that
anyone would have been able to get that
close to her as you can see it's a link
and when typed in it leads to this a few
hours later Mary posts again this time
clarifying the dream about the red
butterflies what she now says were
actually red and moths she also mentions
the word link in the website which she's
yet to figure out entirely another few
hours go by and we get this finally back
to somewhere relatively safe I'll
finally get to take a good look at what
we found so far just getting settled
again maybe the comm will help us figure
this out the piece however doesn't last
very long an hour later we get a string
of alarming post from Mary they start
with her thinking she heard some kind of
noise come from outside which she then
investigates she asked if anyone else
could see a figure outside by the trees
or if it was just her imagination all of
this leads up to a very interesting
discovery
okay so the next batch of things that
happen to occur between June 12th and
14th and for now bring things to a
temporary close I'm going to speed
through them for the sake of the
narrative and then address them as soon
as we're all caught up June 12th meri
expresses being sick of things and also
mentions finding the password to the zip
file again we'll visit this later so you
understand what's going on but honestly
at this point most people had to work
backwards anyway meri then asked what
all the ones and zeros mean the comander
is quickly pointing out the obvious
answer Mary thinks out loud for a few
more times obviously trying to work her
way through some kind of code eventually
she finally posts a very vague status
declaring that she figured out where she
needed to go and that she was heading
there right now at 10:32 p.m. we get the
following video

we are ok x marks the spot
as you hopefully noticed a QR code
popped up at the end and said QR code
led to this a message that once again
references he locked files and says that
in order to get the password you need to
email sleepwalker so for now as far as
the story goes we're left with a
cliffhanger
we don't know where Mary is who took her
or why we also don't know why she was
having such strange dreams about a place
she'd never before seen assuming it
isn't all in her head this is the point
where I'm going to spoil a lot of this
for those of you who want extra details
but as for those of you who would rather
play on your own you can stop watching
now if you're still here then let's take
a step back a bit and revisit
sleepwalker like I said I still haven't
found the reddit account in question I
did see some people talking about posts
that were deleted so maybe that's what

account though it does feature quite a

City but if you check out the archived

mary was trying to figure out the answer
she got for it seemed have been found
here specifically the keyword pepperoni
pizza the symbols here are also
interesting because they resemble
something else you've seen before the
message in the envelope Mary found in
the video and somehow opened up with two
hands despite supposedly holding a phone
anyway this message was actually decoded
by a lovely Reddit user as the following
the stuff on the Instagram story however
has yet to be decoded by anyone at least
as far as I know
sleepwalkers Instagram account also
leads us to another vague thing
mentioned on Mary's page the locked
files the last two posts on the
Instagram account featured fragments of
a mediafire link and of course you can
to open the files without a password as
you hopefully recall the QR code at the
end of Mary's last video led us to this
message and yes I did
email it and this is a response I got ok
so I'm just going to say right now that
what I'm going to say next will either
interest you or completely piss you off
but first yes this was obviously an Arg
by breakout Philippines that's not
actually what I'm building up towards
because that's already really obvious I
noticed a lot of comments calling this a
hoax
blah blah blah and yeah no [ __ ] it's
meant to be an Arg obviously anyway
again that's not the kicker here so as
you can see the email says that the
locked files contain the info we need to
move forward a link was provided and
it's explained that again this is 100%
an Arg what's really interesting about
this though and honestly I'm not sure
how to feel about it yet is that in
order to proceed you need to pay to play
yes this is a pay to play Arg which for
some reason I never thought would be a
thing again this may royally piss some
of you off I know like I said I don't
know how to feel about it either because
on the one hand I mean it was obviously
already promo for a business but the
idea of paying for an Arg is a bit
strange
at the same time I can't say that a Arg
shouldn't be treated more like real
games that we'd pay for anyway I mean if
someone's putting in the work and people
like it then why not I suppose for me
it's just fascinating because it seems
highly experimental especially within
the context of the wider Arg shun rrah
of course companies have put out Arg
type marketing before but I've never
seen the actual Arg become the product
oh and before you ask no this video was
not sponsored by this Arg or break out
Philippines I simply got a request to
cover it and thought it would be
interesting especially since I grew up
out there break out does describe the
game calling it immersive storytelling
complete with live events that are set
to take place in real time over the next
two months or so apparently players
could receive everything from phone
calls all the way to packages as part of
the game it even involves physical
locations within metro manila and actual
interaction with game characters as for
how this thing is going to play out or
how well it's going to do honestly I
have no idea
I definitely be up for playing it if I
was in Manila but as you probably guess
that's not the case for any Filipino
viewers out there who are interested in
playing
best of luck to you and I love to hear
about your experience as far as this
video goes though that's about all I've
